name: Grant Hunter

jv_history.partner_name: Invictus Podcast - Syntropy - Jonas Simanavicius - Co-founder & CTO
jv_history.source_quote: icius) the Co-founder & CTO of Syntropy Learn more about Syntropy: https

what_you_do: I'm a serial entrepreneur with over 25 years of corporate training, marketing and franchising experience in the U.S., Japan, and Peru.
who_you_serve: I'm really interested in working with people and organizations who are facing down that existential crisis of meaning, who may have got everything they wanted by mainstream standards, and still feel empty.
social_proof: BA, Psychology, The University of Iowa; MA, Instructional Design and Technology, with an emphasis on HR Development, The University of Iowa; Global Social Benefit Incubator (GSBI) Alumni, Santa Clara University; Certified Purpose Guide, Purpose Guides Institute
business_focus: Helping people and organizations find deeper purpose and meaning in their work.
service_provided: corporate training, marketing, franchising, purpose guidance, leadership consulting, organizational development
